categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male Jedi served as the Jedi Watchman of the Corbos system. Having lost friends during conflicts with the Sith, the Jedi was anonymously gifted a gauntlet of power. Unbeknownst to the Jedi, the gauntlet had been crafted by the Sith Lord Neer, and it eventually corrupted the Watchman, who began to murder people for even the slightest infraction. This led the Watchman to be killed by his fellow Jedi, after which the gauntlet was taken to Ossus for safekeeping.
